pr_data.body: Create a comprehensive multi-agent deployment plan and instructions for the BMC Uruguay system to facilitate its production launch. ---   ## Summary by Sourcery Add a comprehensive multi-agent deployment and orchestration playbook for the BMC Uruguay system, including roles, phases, timelines, and coordination workflows for taking the platform to production. Documentation: - Introduce a detailed Agent Deployment Plan & Team Instructions document covering system overview, agent roles, phased rollout, workflows, risk management, and success metrics. - Add an Orchestrator Kickoff Guide that gives an hour-by-hour Day 1 plan and ongoing routines for the technical lead to run the deployment. - Provide a Deployment Package Summary that explains the documentation set, roles, phases, milestones, and how different stakeholders should use the materials. - Create an Agent Task Matrix with phase-by-phase, day-by-day tasks, checklists, and progress tracking structures for each agent role. - Add a Start Here deployment index to route orchestrators, agents, and stakeholders to the appropriate deployment documents.
pr_data.title: Plan agent deployment and team instructions
